subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Steven Stamkos had two goals and two assists, the rookie goalie Cedrick Desjardins won in his N.H.L. debut and the host Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Montreal Canadiens, 4-1.
snippet: Steven Stamkos had two goals and two assists, the rookie goalie Cedrick Desjardins won in his N.H.L. debut and the host Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Montreal Canadiens, 4-1.
